name: The Settlers IV: Gold Edition
notes:
-No flickering when changing the resolution
-no full screen if game resolution is not equal to desktop resolution
-Use Widescreen Fix to have full screen in the game

files.settlers: N/A:Select the Windows installer downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- settlers: N/A:Select the Windows installer downloaded from GOG
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Settlers 4 Gold/S4.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: /silent /nogui
    executable: settlers
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  Desktop: true
  WineDesktop: $RESOLUTION
